links.title: Steve "Woz" Wozniak on blockchain (bitcoin and Ethereum)
links.description: Steve Wozniak in Malta asked about blockchain answers why he sold his bitcoin (he hates trading and stocks apart from apple's, price volatility (same reason on why he does not own any other shares) made him sell all except one so he can still "play" around) and that he is impressed and loves Ethereum.

links.title: Is a trade war coming?
links.description: End of Day Update: Tuesday was a relatively benign session for the S&P500 with prices bouncing between modest losses and gains. But that no longer matters because shortly after the close, Trump's top economic advisor dropped a bombshell by resigning in protest over the proposed tariffs.

links.title: As Cohn Stock Selloff Gets Nasty, Investors Send Broad Range of Assets Lower
links.description: Gary Cohn's departure from the White House could be upping the ante in a market already on its toes. Cohn said Tuesday, March 6, that he plans to depart his role as President Donald Trump's top economic adviser in the coming weeks.

messages.body: More Than A Phone: The 'Light Phone 2' Fights Back Against Addictive Technology https://benzinga.com/z/11314360 $AAPL $FB $SNAP $TWTR

links.title: More Than A Phone: 'Light Phone 2' Fights Back Against Addictive Technology
links.description: Addicted to your smartphone? We check our phones on average 47 times per day, according to a Deloitte study. There is a growing awareness around the negative consequences of smartphone addiction. This week, Stanford students called on Apple Inc. (NASDAQ: AAPL) to launch an essentials product - calls, texts and photos only.
